trans-unit.source: Supports the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform LINQ data operations.
trans-unit.target: 지원 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> 제어 하 고 LINQ 데이터 작업을 수행할 데이터 바인딩된 컨트롤에 대 한 인터페이스를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceView class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code.
trans-unit.target: LinqDataSourceView 클래스는 페이지 코드에서 프로그래밍 가능한 개체 하지 데이터 바인딩된 컨트롤에서 사용할 수 하는 데 주로 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Page developers typically use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control to interact with data.
trans-unit.target: 페이지 개발자가 일반적으로 사용 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>데이터와 상호 작용을 제어 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET data source controls contain one or more lists of data, represented by data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 데이터 소스 컨트롤의 데이터를 데이터 원본 뷰 개체를 나타내는 하나 이상의 목록을 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceView class extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> 를 확장 하는 LinqDataSourceView 클래스는

trans-unit.source: It defines the capabilities of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control with which it is associated, and it implements the basic data functionality for the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 기능을 정의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>제어 된 콘텐츠인지 연결, 및 데이터 소스 제어에 대 한 기본 데이터 기능을 구현 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceView class implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Select%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Update%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Insert%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Delete%2A> operations.
trans-unit.target: LinqDataSourceView 클래스가 구현 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Select%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Update%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Insert%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Delete%2A>작업.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Delete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Update%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also implements sorting, filtering, and managing settings that are kept in view state.
trans-unit.target: 또한 정렬, 필터링 및 설정 보기에 유지 되는 상태 관리 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Although the LinqDataSourceView object is not directly exposed to page developers, many of its properties and methods can be accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: LinqDataSourceView 개체는 페이지 개발자에 게 직접 노출 되지 않지만 다양 한 메서드와 속성을 통해 액세스할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceView control implements the following data retrieval methods and events and exposes them to page developers and to other callers through the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: LinqDataSourceView 컨트롤 다음 데이터 검색 메서드 및 이벤트를 구현 하 고 페이지 개발자를 통해 연결 된 다른 호출자를 노출 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>제어:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selected> event.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selected>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selected>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating> event.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updated> event.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updated>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updated>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting> event.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserted> event.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserted>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserted>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Delete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Delete%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting> event.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleted> event.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleted>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleted>

trans-unit.source: You can sort the data that you retrieve with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control by adding an `OrderBy` clause.
trans-unit.target: 검색 하는 데이터를 정렬할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>추가 하 여 제어는 `OrderBy` 절.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You can provide a sort expression for the LinqDataSourceView instance by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: LinqDataSourceView 인스턴스에 대 한 정렬 식을 설정 하 여 제공할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>에 전달 되는 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Select%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The syntax for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> property is the same as the syntax for a <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 구문은 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>속성에 대 한 구문과 동일은 <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceView control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests.
trans-unit.target: LinqDataSourceView 컨트롤에서 구현 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>인터페이스 및 사용 하 여 뷰 페이지 요청에 대해 해당 상태를 추적 하는 상태.</xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>

trans-unit.source: Implementations of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.LoadViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.SaveViewState%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TrackViewState%2A> methods are provided to enable view-state tracking for the control.
trans-unit.target: 구현에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.IsTrackingViewState%2A>속성 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.LoadViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.SaveViewState%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TrackViewState%2A>컨트롤에 대 한 뷰 상태를 추적할 수 있도록 위한 메서드가 제공 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TrackViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.LoadViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.IsTrackingViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [ASP.NET 상태 관리 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> class, setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control as the owner of the current view.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> 클래스를 지정 된 설정 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> 현재 보기의 소유자로 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceView constructor is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GetView%2A> method to return a new instance of a data source view with the specified `name` parameter.
trans-unit.target: LinqDataSourceView 생성자를 호출는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GetView%2A>지정 된 데이터 원본 뷰의 새 인스턴스를 반환 하는 메서드 `name` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView> object is associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control at a time.
trans-unit.target: 하나의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>개체에 연결 된 한 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>한 번에 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView> object is always `DefaultView`, although this naming restriction is imposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control, not by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView> control.
trans-unit.target: 이름에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>개체는 항상 `DefaultView`이 명명 언제나 하지만는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>제어 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support views that use a different naming convention.
trans-unit.target: 재정의할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>다른 명명 규칙을 사용 하는 뷰를 지원 하기 위해 메서드에.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> instance that is passed by the `context` parameter is used by the data source view to access parameter collections.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>전달 되는 인스턴스는 `context` 액세스 매개 변수 컬렉션에는 데이터 원본 뷰에서 매개 변수를 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The data source control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 소스 컨트롤의 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> 개체가 연결 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A unique name for the data source view within the scope of the data source control that owns it.
trans-unit.target: 소유 하는 데이터 소스 컨트롤의 범위 내에서 데이터 원본 뷰에 대 한 고유 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재 <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> 개체와 현재 연결 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> 컨트롤 삭제 작업을 지원 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CanDelete property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableDelete%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 속성은 CanDelete 반환 `true` 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableDelete%2A>속성이로 설정 되어 `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableDelete%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, a delete operation can still fail if the associated data properties are not set or are not set correctly.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 연결 된 데이터 속성 설정 되지 않은 또는 올바르게 설정 되지 않은 경우 삭제 작업이 실패할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>작업을 지원 되 면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> 개체와 현재 연결 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> 컨트롤 삽입 작업을 지원 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The CanInsert property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableInsert%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 속성은 CanInsert 반환 `true` 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableInsert%2A>속성이로 설정 되어 `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableInsert%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, an insert operation can still fail if the associated data properties are not set or are not set correctly.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 연결 된 데이터 속성 설정 되지 않은 또는 올바르게 설정 되지 않은 경우 삽입 작업이 실패할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>작업을 지원 되 면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports paging of retrieved data.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> 개체와 현재 연결 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> 컨트롤에 검색 된 데이터의 페이징을 지원 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView> object always supports paging even if data presentation control does not use paging.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>데이터 표시 컨트롤이 페이징을 사용 하지 않는 경우에 항상 개체 페이징을 지원 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage%2A> property is set to `false`, you can manually page the data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage%2A>속성이 `false`, 직접에 데이터를 페이징할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Selecting>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Selecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to retrieving the data.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> 개체와 현재 연결 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> 컨트롤 데이터를 검색 하는 것 외에도 데이터 행의 총 수를 검색할 수 있도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the total number of rows that can be paged to determine how to render paging controls.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 바인딩된 컨트롤 페이징 컨트롤을 렌더링 하는 방법을 결정 하기 위해 페이징할 수 있는 행의 총 수를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, this value is used to determine how many numeric pager buttons to render in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control pager.
trans-unit.target: 숫자 페이저 단추의에서 렌더링할 수를 확인 하려면이 값은 사용 하는 예를 들어 한 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>호출기를 제어 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage%2A> property is set to `false`, you must manually set the total row count in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Selecting> event.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that contains new row values for the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 업데이트 작업에 대 한 새 행 값을 포함 하는 사전입니다.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that contains the old row values for the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 업데이트 작업에 대 한 오래 된 행 값을 포함 하는 사전입니다.

trans-unit.source: The update operation is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 업데이트 작업이 지원 되지 않습니다.
